idea:
LetzRent is an online rental search & booking platform. It aggregates & compares rental deals on Self Drive Cars, Chauffeur Driven Cars, Monthly Car Rental, Co-Living & Co-Working. It reviews rental facts, prices & information from multiple rental service providers.


And since we are a B2C start up, let’s understand what customer wants:

1) Low Prices: And to get low prices 85% of the consumer check at least 2 data points (Source: BCG Consumer Trends). In various sectors information centred buying has been made more efficient by companies like MMT for Travel, Policy bazaar for Insurance, Myntra or Shopperstop for Lifestyle products. However for rental products there is no one & to fill this need and make the process efficient we launched Letzrent, hoping to have a first mover advantage and dominate the market in coming future. 2) Vast Selection: Being an aggregator Letzrent offer more options than category leader. 3) Prompt Customer Service: We don’t just say it but understand the impact of customer service in building a long term business. We believe in two rules I) Customer First II) Customer First WHY RENTING? 1) Demographic Twist: Commitment phobic millennial prefer an asset lite life with a bias for renting rather than buying.


2) Flexibility: Renting allows people to upgrade or change asset easily. 3) Convenience: With the rental customer dispense with the headache of down payment, maintenance, insurance etc. WHY US: We are a team of two with complimentary skillset in Sales & technology
name: LetzRent

idea:
Nachke is India's first Dance wear brand, its business model is to create a new segment in the apparel market by creating new ranges of active wear which will be based on dance. Nachke is already created a buzz in the market by introducing Dancewear fashion and making a one stop shop for all active wear gym wear, premium wear and fashion lovers.

Nachke wants to create a shopping experience for everyone who loves to dance and fashion by creating exclusive and affordable premium fashionable active wear.

Nachke is all online now and is looking forward to make its retail presence by building exclusive showrooms all over india.
name: NACHKE CLOTHING SERVICES (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Wow InfoBiz, has a strong focus on Enterprise Consulting & System Integration, by providing end to end solutions in the areas of SAP ERP, Robotics Process Automation (RPA), Business Intelligence, Mobility, Web 2.0 which has been implemented successfully for some of the Leading Enterprises in the space of IT/ITeS, Media & Entertainment, Pharma, FMCG, Manufacturing, Hospitality, Tours & Travel, Logistics, Healthcare, Education, and Emerging Technologies.


Our proposed solution can provide various benefits to the organization like:

• Implement digital workforce

• Cost Optimization

• Error reductions

• Speed to execute a job

• Streamline mission-critical processes

• Improve employee experience/morale

• Improve customer satisfaction

• Better regulatory compliance


Our unique value proposition:

• Experience in Business IT transformation, Digital Transformation, leading and managing IT effectively.

• Enterprise Consulting & System Integration, by providing end to end solutions

• We use technology to simplify business, create long-term value and enable connected life.

• We treasure economy of value over the economy of scale and use Innovation in every aspect of our solutions and customer engagement.

• We understand our customers and align our goal towards solving their business challenges by using our unique solution stack.

• We strive to develop and deliver cutting-edge solutions which enable our customers to achieve growth, success, and satisfaction solutions using innovation, creative excellence, efficiency, performance, and superior service. We endeavor to create value for our customers, partners, and stakeholders.
name: Wow InfoBiz Pvt. Ltd.

name: KRYO CS Engineering Pvt. Ltd

idea: Pyrotask Energy was founded with a mission to implement circular economy in India. Using chemical recycling techniques we are able to convert mixed waste plastics into hydrocarbon oil which can be used in industries as fuel, reducing the dependence on commercially available industrial fuels. This oil can further be processed to make precursors for virgin plastic. On one end municipal bodies, industrial waste generators and collection centers, on the other petrochemical companies and industries that can use the oil in different application; we are creating supply chain connections and generating wealth from waste.
name: Pyrotask Energy
